We’re so happy you’re able to make the trip! We hope you’ll have a chance to explore Oakland and San Francisco while you’re here. We’ve listed a few of our favorite spots.

text: {link}{break}We had to include this one :) Great variety of beer, great mixed drinks, all outdoors to enjoy to California weather.
{link}{break}This is where you’ll land if you take the ferry at Jack London. There’s so much food. Stephanie suggests Gott’s Roadside and Humphrey Slocome ice cream.
